prod_desc: Build and defend The Jungle Tree House!
prod_long_desc:
Join forces with Alex to defeat the invading mobs. Activate the secret trapdoor to surprise the roaming skeleton, lure the exploding Creeper™ onto the floor trap and make a quick exit down the waterfall. Enjoy hands-on Minecraft™ adventures featuring your favorite characters and objects with this LEGO® Minecraft set—designed for young fans of the highly successful sandbox video game. Includes 2 minifigures: Steve and Alex, plus a Creeper™, skeleton, ocelot and a sheep.
Includes 2 minifigures: Steve and Alex, plus a Creeper™, skeleton, ocelot and a sheep.
Grab your iron sword, don your helmet and defend the jungle tree house against the invading mobs.
Surprise the skeleton with the secret trapdoor.
Activate the floor trap function to foil the exploding Creeper™ attack.
Make a quick getaway on the waterfall slide.
Accessory elements include Steve’s helmet, Alex’s armored leggings, crafting table, bed, fire, bucket, cocoa pods, wheat, cookies and 4 buildable flowerpots.
Tool elements include Steve’s axe and Alex’s pickaxe.
Weapons include a sword and a bow.
Remodel the set by moving the top section of the house onto the sheep pen.
Set your imagination free—rebuild the set for more LEGO® Minecraft™ creations!
Includes more than 700 LEGO® bricks.
Measures over 8” high, 11” wide and 10” long.
